      • generateHeightOfComponent

        int generateHeightOfComponent(String text,
                            int width)
        Generate appropriate height UI component to hold the error message, in order to avoid scroll bars to display the first level the error message. The height is calculate using a formula based on the length of error message and also the width of the UI component.
